    • storeCards

      public void storeCards(Hand myHand, ArrayList<Integer> valueTable, ArrayList<Integer> suiteTable)
      Methode who store the cards in the tables
      Parameters:
      myHand - the hand of the player
      valueTable - the table who will contain the number of cards of each value
      suiteTable - the table who will contain the number of cards of each suite
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the size of the tables is not correct

    • resetTables

      public void resetTables(ArrayList<Integer> valueTable, ArrayList<Integer> suiteTable)
      Parameters:
      valueTable -
      suiteTable - resets all values of the tables to 0s

    • rearrangeCardsToFront

      public void rearrangeCardsToFront(int index1, int index2)
      Method to rearrange the cards to the front of the hand.
      Parameters:
      index1 - first card to rearrange
      index2 - second card to rearrange
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the indexes are invalid.
